div.h2: Claim Medicare Non Payment Reason Code

div.p: The reason that no Medicare payment is made for services on an institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clmmdcrnonpmtrsn_cd
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

name.value: Claim Medicare Non Payment Reason Code

description.value: The reason that no Medicare payment is made for services on an institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clm_mdcr_non_pmt_rsn_cd
